dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. In upper right margin: Meyer's Hand Atlas. N124. Includes inset of Berlin region, panoramic view of "Berlin vom Kreutzberge aus," list of "Earben Erklär," directory of "Gasthöfe u. Hotels ersten Ranges," and ill.
dct_publisher_sm: [Hildburghausen] : Stich, Druck und Verlag der geographischen Anstalt des Bibliographischen Instituts zu Hildburghausen, [ca. 1850]
